org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.remediation

Class RemediationAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.remediation.RemediationAction

  • public class RemediationAction
extends Object
    Class that represents a remediation action to correct a vulnerability For example : applying a patch, training a user, deploying a firewall or snort rule,... This remediation may be applicable on several machines
    Author:
    Francois -Xavier Aguessy

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RemediationAction.ActionType
      The possible types of remediation

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private RemediationAction.ActionType actionType
      The type of action of the remediation action
      private OperationalCostParameters operationalCostParameters
      The parameters used to compute the operational cost for this remediation action
      private List<InformationSystemHost> possibleMachines
      The possible machines on which the remediation can be deployed
      private Vertex relatedVertex
      The vertex in the attack graph related to this remediation
      private List<Object> remediationParameters
      The parameters contained in this remediation : if the remediation is a "APPLY_PATCH" : each object is a "Patch" object if the remediation is a "DEPLOY_SNORT_RULE" : each object is a "Rule" if the remediation is a "TRAIN_USER" : there is only one object : a String containing the name of the user to train if the remediation is a "DEPLOY_FIREWALL_RULE" : there is only one object : a "FirewallRule"

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemediationAction(RemediationAction.ActionType actionType, String costParametersFolder)
      Create a new remediation action
